div.div: Wabash College vs. College of Wooster
at Wooster, Ohio | John P. Papp Stadium

tr.td: Wabash wins the coin toss, defers to the second half.
Andrew Tutsie kickoff 59 yards to the WOO6, Connor Allan return 15 yards to the WOO21 (Luke Kseniak).
David Smith pass incomplete to Tyson Vogel.
David Smith pass complete to Connor Allan for 35 yards to the WAB44, 1ST DOWN WOO (Connor Ludwig).
